name: Signed Phepsi Buthelezi BIL Jersey
description: Stand a chance to invest in Phepsi Buthelezi by bidding on his Signed jersey worn on 7 July 2021 in his game against the British and Irish Lions. The jersey is embroidered with the date, venue and game name. Phepsi is a brilliant player with a stellar career in front of him – this means that the jersey stands to become a valuable collectible. The winning bidder will receive an NFT that gives the holder ownership of this jersey. The NFT owner can elect to have the item shipped to them, or to keep it safe in the Shark Vault to redeem or trade at a later stage. The full price of the winning bid will go towards the clean-up efforts in KZN. If the NFT is resold again in future, 10% of the sales price will go back to The Sharks' charitable efforts.
